body: Most of the time I play single player in Minecraft I play on hardcore, and with the success of Luke The Notable's series it seems that the game mode is getting mode popular. Would anyone be interested in an event log through Ruqqus posts starting from day 1 in hardcore mode with natural regeneration turned off? It would consist of a bulleted list of achievements and events under the respective day they occurred on along with in-game snapshots to enhance the narrative. Open to ideas on this if anyone has thoughts on it. Thanks!

title: Thoughts on a No Natural Regen Hardcore Event Log?
